name: Deep Sea Runner
description:
Deep Sea Fish Runner is a simple side scroller where you control a school of fish moving through the ocean and attempt to keep as many fish alive by avoiding the fishing nets, falling rubbish and the approaching oil spill!

The game was one of the winning games made for the Berlin Ocean Jam over the weekend of the 20 - 21st May 2017. The purpose of the Game Jam was to create something that would communicate the urgent issues affecting the ocean such as pollution and overfishing.  

Controls:

Click and hold your mouse down in the direction that you want your school of fish to move to. 

The Team:

Programmers: Georgie McDaniel, Carlos Reis.
Art: Jules Langram, Evgenia Golubeva, Moritz Horn.
